query:
SELECT 
  serial_num, 
  step_name, 
  system_id,
  last_upd_date, 
  CH1_REMEASURE_POWER_DBM ch1, 
  CH2_REMEASURE_POWER_DBM ch2, 
  CH3_REMEASURE_POWER_DBM ch3, 
  CH4_REMEASURE_POWER_DBM ch4
FROM 
  lr4_shim_assembly a
WHERE 
  last_upd_date > SYSDATE -.3  AND 
  step_name = 'LR4 SI LENS STANDARD CHECK'
